name: Slow Run Twice
description:
This is a turn based strategy game, where you have to predict the movement of the enemies who follow a specific pattern, to stay alive for as long as possible.

If the enemies collide with each other, they both die, and if you collide with an enemy, you die. However, if multiple enemies attack you at once,  the enemies kill each other and you survive. This creates more interesting and playable gameplay.

The world is endless, with lakes being generated all over the world. You as the player cannot enter the lake, but enemies won't change their path.

If they fall into the water, they drown and die.
